section.22: The Book on Virtues of Jihad

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah: That the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said, "I was shown the first of (every) three to enter Paradise: A martyr, an 'Atif, who is a Muta'affif, and a slave who perfected his worship of Allah, and was sincere to his masters." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan
